text: Claude Le Ber (7 June 1931 – 14 July 2016) was a French racing cyclist. He rode three editions of the Tour de France and won the two time-trial stages of the 1956 Vuelta a España.http://www.siteducyclisme.net/coureurfiche.php?coureurid=14496 ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2016 deaths Category:French male cyclists Category:French Vuelta a España stage winners Category:Tour de France cyclists
title: Claude Le Ber
